attributes.action: Make Marijuana Legal For Arthritis Sufferers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition i have started for arthritis sufferers.
i would like to legalize Marijuana for arthritis sufferers only because as people with arthritis have to live their lives going through pain everyday and the effects of marijuana within moderation can help to reduce the pain for sufferers, i know how much pain these people go through as my nana has arthritis and i see this as the only way to help her out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
